elements.label: Automatically Add Waypoints for Traders:
elements.tooltip: A unique waypoint will be added for traders, when you first interact with them.

elements.label: Automatically Add Waypoints for Teleporter Blocks:
elements.tooltip: A unique waypoint will be added for teleporters, when you first travel through them.

elements.label: Automatically Add Waypoints for Translocators:
elements.tooltip: A unique waypoint will be added for translocators, when you first travel through them.

elements.label: Automatically Add Waypoints for Surface Deposits:
elements.tooltip: A unique waypoint will be added for mineable metals, when you collect surface deposits.
